topic.title: Rental Prices
topic.shortdesc: Depending on the amount of devices and how long you need them for, you will have different pricing options for equipment rentals. If rentals are not returned within alotted time, you are charged 5% of your original payment for each day that passes after the due date.

section.title: Laptops
section.p: Laptop computers are available to rent for $10 per laptop each hour. If you want more than five, however, you can get them for $7 each per hour. These laptop rentals last for a maximum of one day, but special requests are considered.

section.title: iPad Pros
section.p: iPad Pros are available to rent for $8 per iPad each hour. If you want more than five, however, you can get them for $6 each per hour. These iPad rentals last for a maximum of one day, but special requests are considered.

section.title: Videocameras
section.p: Videocameras are available to rent for $7 per videocamera each hour. If you want more than five, however, you can get them for $5 each per hour. These videocamera rentals last for a maximum of one day, but special requests are considered.
